channel.title: apt autoremove best practice ?
channel.description:
After a while of updating system i got many packages that are not used. APT says i can remove these by running apt autoremove. But I'm afraid to run apt autoremove on whonix-gateway because maybe that can break gateway somehow ? I worry about this because i read on stackexchange that apt manager "only thinks" these packages are no longer needed, but there is chance that they are in use.
I want ask what is recommended thing todo here. Do i must run apt autoremove, or it doesn't matter ? Does leaving old packages decrease security ? Please advice what is recommended practice with apt autoremove on whonix-gateway.
